title: Reference: Lady Siduri
altText: Reference for Siduri, an OC for "Chocobo and the Magic Picture Book: The Witch, the Girl, and the Five Heroes
caption:
Here's a reference for Siduri to go along with Gilgamesh's reference! She's a formidable knight of the "Black Wolves", one of two armies of the Barnard Kingdom led by Captain Volg. Siduri comes off as a bit dim-witted, but can be frighteningly perceptive at times. Her life was turned upside down after the assassination of the king.

Captain Gilgamesh of the second army, "Hell's Gate", not only manipulated Volg's second-in-command, Enkidu, into assassinating the king and then framing Volg, but he later kidnapped the princess and attempted to force her into marrying him. Volg would team up with a mysterious chocobo who had wandered into the kingdom and together they would defeat Gilgamesh, foiling his plans.

Gilgamesh, having been stripped of his role as captain, was to be tried for his crimes, with Lady Siduri being tasked to escort him to the court. That is...until the two were spirited away by a Zu, no doubt attracted to Siduri's shimmmering armor (but it was actually Gilgamesh's brightly-colored robes that drew in the fiend).

Although Siduri managed to free herself and Gilgamesh from the clutches of the winged beast, they were taken far, FAR away from the kingdom, and that's where the story of their own adventure to return to the Kingdom's capital begins.
transcript:
**Text near a chibi Siduri at the bottom left**: Actual battle armor

**Text near Siduri starting from the left**: Basic armor worn in castle. Mostly used for show.

**Text near Siduri from the second left**: Basic dagger for defense

**Text near Siduri in the far right**: Civilian outfit

**Text near her arm on the far right**: Has a couple of scars, including a bite"

title: Reference: Ex-Captain Gilgamesh
altText: Reference for Gilgamesh from "Chocobo and the Magic Picture Book: The Witch, the Girl, and the Five Heroes"
caption: Do you ever just want to play a game that was only released in Japan and also doesn't have a translation ROM, so you buy the game and then play it with your wife despite not knowing any Japanese so the two of you play through it by manually translating every dialogue by taking pictures and putting it through Google Translate, or are you normal?\n\nAnyway, here's Gilgamesh, because there's no high quality art of his final form, and I'm taking some artistic liberties so I don't go insane trying to figure out his design!
transcript:
**Text near Gilgamesh's top headshot on the left**: Facial markings are natural. The rest are tattooes.

**Text near Gilgamesh's bottom headshot on left**: Grade A charmer and manipulator

**Text near Gilgamesh's hand and foot**: Additional tattoos

**Text near Gilgamesh on right side of image**: Usually hides (all) arms when wearing robe"

title: A Hug or Two
altText: Siduri (OC) and Gilgamesh (Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) in a very loving and sweet hug
caption: I hadn't colored a pencil sketch in a while, it was fun and saves a lot of time!

title: Safety First (part 2)
altText: Gilgamesh (Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) wearing two pool noodles on his horns.
caption: The winner was pool noodles! Funny enough, the original sketch had tennis balls, but I am a man of my word and drew in the pool noodles lol

title: Safety First (part 1)
altText: Gilgamesh (Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) deciding between two items that Siduri (OC) is holding: a pool noodle and a tennis ball
caption: This was posted on Tumblr and Twitter with a poll attached! The result is in the [next picture](/art/ff/saftey-first-part-2)!
transcript: Text near Siduri reads, "Pool noodle" and "Tennis ball"

title: First Kiss
altText: A comic depicting Siduri (OC) and Gilgamesh (Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) sharing their first kiss.
caption: Would you smooch an oni?

title: My One and Only
altText: Gilgamesh (Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) holding up Siduri (OC) with four of his arms, bringing her to his eye level. The two are smiling.
caption: This was cleaned up from a sketch I drew while visiting my sister! My parents saw it and thought it was very cute aaaaa!

title: #BestCouple
altText: Gilgamesh (Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) and Siduri (OC). Siduri is on Gilgamesh's shoulers and resting her arms on his head while Gilgamesh is looking at the camera making a kissy lips expression and using his hands to make two heart gestures
caption: A drawing I made into a mobile wallpaper for me and Sam! Had a lot of fun with this one. :3

title: Moment of Respite
altText: Gilgamesh (Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) and Siduri (OC) lying on a floor and cuddling as Siduri is scratching a peacefully sleeping Gilgamesh's horn.
caption: A smaller doodle that I wanted to clean up and color! Everything about Gilgamesh is a mystery, right down to whether those horns are real or just decorations.\n\nI'd like to think that they are indeed real, and that he likes having them scratched. :3

title: Good Luck. I Love You.
altText: Siduri (OC) and Gilgamesh (Final Fantasy VII Rebirth). Gilgamesh is crouching to meet Siduri at eye-level, and Siduri is lovingly holding the bladesman's face.
caption: Even if we don't know how the third part of the FFVII remake trilogy will go, I'd like to think this would take place right before the party's final battle with Sephiroth!

title: Kiss Me, You Fool
altText: Siduri (OC) and Gilgamesh (Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) in an embracing kiss.
caption: I probably should've waited to reveal more details about Siduri and let people get to know her better before drawing any romantic stuff but uh... -looks at writing on hand- "It's my blog, I do what I want"?
